channel.title: Error: could not find or load main class server.server
channel.description:
ive been working on this a bit now. i was trying to make my deathly pkz pi client work so i could use it with my different source and so i changed the server ip in my client.java to local host 127.0.0.1 and saved it. the client still didnt work so i figured i'd try to get the compiler working. After following the guide to setting my EV this is the error i get when trying to compile. [code]Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
This is the code for my compiler and i got it from following the guide to setting Environmental variables . [code]@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin/java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
This is the client's run-bat: [code]@echo off java -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
The client will currently load when i run it but it says error connecting to server, please try again in 1minute. when i try to login. i Figured it is because i changed the clients ip to local host but have not got the compiler to work yet/ any help is appreciated
Edited: in case it is needed when setting EV this is what i did CLASSPATH = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin;;%systemroot%\system32

item.title: Error: could not find or load main class server.server
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

C:\ProgramData\Oracle\Java\java is not a path in my c drive at all. i dont even see programdata or oracle in my c drive

Read full topic
item.source: Error: could not find or load main class server.server

item.title: Error: could not find or load main class server.server
item.dc:creator: @anthonyarggg anthonyarggg
item.description:
@anthonyarggg wrote:

idk if its just me that did it like this but i put my path as:
C:\ProgramData\Oracle\Java\javapath;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin

follow that from your C drive see if it makes sense if so try that.
obviously replace 1.X.X_XX with your version

Read full topic
item.source: Error: could not find or load main class server.server

item.title: Error: could not find or load main class server.server
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

ive been working on this a bit now. i was trying to make my deathly pkz pi client work so i could use it with my different source and so i changed the server ip in my client.java to local host 127.0.0.1 and saved it. the client still didnt work so i figured i’d try to get the compiler working. After following the guide to setting my EV this is the error i get when trying to compile.

Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . .

This is the code for my compiler and i got it from following the guide to setting Environmental variables .

@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin/java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

This is the client’s run-bat:

@echo off java -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

The client will currently load when i run it but it says error connecting to server, please try again in 1minute. when i try to login.
i Figured it is because i changed the clients ip to local host but have not got the compiler to work yet/
any help is appreciated

Edited: in case it is needed when setting EV this is what i did
CLASSPATH = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin;;%systemroot%\system32

Read full topic
